original_text: But if you want to have sex too strongly, then you should marry. It is better to do that than to want to have sex all the time.
korean_text: 만일 절제할 수 없거든 결혼하라 정욕이 불 같이 타는 것보다 결혼하는 것이 나으니라

sentences.original_text: But if you want to have sex too strongly
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 만약 당신이 성관계를 너무 강하게 원한다면

sentences.original_text: It is better to do that
than to want to have sex all the time
